## lintPackageJson() function

Lints and eventually fix the `package.json` files matching the given glob patterns given as argument.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function lintPackageJson(input: readonly string[], fix?: boolean, configFile?: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  input | readonly string\[\] | List of <code>package.json</code> glob patterns |
|  fix | boolean | True if the linter should try to fix issues, false otherwise |
|  configFile | string | An optional configuration file to load |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
